R

read(int) - Method in class mypackage.FilePageAccess
It reads a data page from the index file
readDate(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads an date in the form dd/mm/yyyy from standard input and returns it as value.In case of an error it returns null
readNegativeFloat(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads an negative float from standard input and returns it as value.
readNegativeInt(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads an negative integer from standard input and returns it as value.
readNext() - Method in class mypackage.FilePageAccess
It reads the next data page from the index file
readPositiveFloat(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads an positive float, zero included, from standard input and returns it as value.
readPositiveInt(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads an positive integer, zero included, from standard input and returns it as value.
readString(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads a string from standard inputand returns it as value.
readTime(String) - Method in class mypackage.StandardInputRead
It reads an time in the form h:mm AM or PM from standard input and returns it as value.In case of an error it returns null Example of valid times: 8:30 AM, 2:00 PM, etc
